items.question: What is remote home digital protection?
items.answer: We connect via secure video call and guide you through all security settings of your accounts, devices, router and smart home.

items.question: Do you take full remote control of my device?
items.answer: No. You stay fully in control. You click. We guide you step by step.

items.question: Which countries do you serve?
items.answer: Germany, Austria, Switzerland and other EU countries.

items.question: What do I need to prepare?
items.answer: Laptop, smartphone, router access, list of accounts and optionally YubiKeys.

items.question: How long does one session take?
items.answer: Basic: 60–90 min. Standard/Family: 2–3 hours. Premium is often split into two calls.

items.question: Do you install antivirus?
items.answer: We use built-in tools first (Defender / macOS). Additional tools only if needed.

items.question: Can you guarantee I will never be hacked?
items.answer: No cybersecurity provider can. But we close 90% of typical home-attack vectors.

items.question: What happens after the session?
items.answer: You receive a summary and recommendations. Premium includes annual review.
